name: Poornima
description: Poornima H N is a Certified Financial Planner (CFP) living in Bengaluru, Karnataka. Being an avid reader, she has done her post-graduation in English Literature from KSOU, Mysuru. She has been writing and editing personal finance articles for EMICalculator.net since inception. Her interests include retirement planning, behavioural finance, yoga and classic literature.
